entry.title: [META] Mailing list move
entry.summary: On March 16, 2019, Rusty Russell informed the Lightning-dev mailing list that Linux Foundation is deprecating their mailing list infrastructure and migrating them to groups.io. Following bitcoin-dev's direction, Russell expects this list to follow within the week. Those who wish to unsubscribe can do so before then. ZmnSCPxj inquired about how to remain on the lightning-dev mailing list, to which there was no clear answer provided.
